authorizationEndpointQueryParameters.description: The query parameters used in authorization request, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

flowName.description: Describes the flow name, for example 'AuthCode' for Oauth 2.0

isApiKeyInPostPayload.description: Marks if the key should sent in header

tokenEndpoint.description: The endpoint used to issue a token, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

tokenEndpointQueryParameters.description: The query parameters used in token request, used in Oauth 2.0 flow

auth.description: Describe the authentication type of the poller

paging.description: Describe the poll request paging config of the poller

request.description: Describe the poll request config parameters of the poller

response.description: Describe the response config parameters of the poller

nextPageParaName.description: Defines the name of a next page attribute

nextPageTokenJsonPath.description: Defines the path to a next page token JSON

pageCountAttributePath.description: Defines the path to a page count attribute

pageSizeParaName.description: Defines the name of the page size parameter

pageTimeStampAttributePath.description: Defines the path to a paging time stamp attribute

pageTotalCountAttributePath.description: Defines the path to a page total count attribute

searchTheLatestTimeStampFromEventsList.description: Determines whether to search for the latest time stamp in the events list

apiEndpoint.description: Describe the endpoint we should pull the data from

endTimeAttributeName.description: This will be used the query events from the end of the time window

headers.description: Describe the headers sent in the poll request

httpMethod.description: The http method type we will use in the poll request, GET or POST

queryParameters.description: Describe the query parameters sent in the poll request

queryParametersTemplate.description: For advanced scenarios for example user name/password embedded in nested JSON payload

queryTimeFormat.description: The time format will be used the query events in a specific window

queryWindowInMin.description: The window interval we will use the pull the data

retryCount.description: Describe the amount of time we should try and poll the data in case of failure

startTimeAttributeName.description: This will be used the query events from a start of the time window

timeoutInSeconds.description: The number of seconds we will consider as a request timeout

eventsJsonPaths.description: Describes the path we should extract the data in the response

isGzipCompressed.description: Describes if the data in the response is Gzip

successStatusJsonPath.description: Describes the path we should extract the status code in the response

successStatusValue.description: Describes the path we should extract the status value in the response

Required permissions for the connector resource provider that define in ResourceProviders.
For more information about the permissions see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/role-based-access-control/role-definitions#actions-format">here</see>.

lookbackDuration.description: Limit the group to alerts created within the lookback duration (in ISO 8601 duration format)

matchingMethod.description: Grouping matching method. When method is Selected at least one of groupByEntities, groupByAlertDetails, groupByCustomDetails must be provided and not empty.

tenantId.description: The tenant id to connect to, and get the data from.

name.description: Name of the author. Company or person.

domains.description: domain for the solution content item

verticals.description: Industry verticals for the solution content item

author.description: The creator of the content item.

categories.description: Categories for the solution content item

contentId.description: Static ID for the content.  Used to identify dependencies and content from solutions or community.  Hard-coded/static for out of the box content and solutions. Dynamic for user-created.  This is the resource name

contentSchemaVersion.description: Schema version of the content. Can be used to distinguish between different flow based on the schema version

customVersion.description: The custom version of the content. A optional free text

dependencies.description: Dependencies for the content item, what other content items it requires to work.  Can describe more complex dependencies using a recursive/nested structure. For a single dependency an id/kind/version can be supplied or operator/criteria for complex formats.

firstPublishDate.description: first publish date solution content item

icon.description: the icon identifier. this id can later be fetched from the solution template

kind.description: The kind of content the metadata is for.

lastPublishDate.description: last publish date for the solution content item

parentId.description: Full parent resource ID of the content item the metadata is for.  This is the full resource ID including the scope (subscription and resource group)

previewImages.description: preview image file names. These will be taken from the solution artifacts

previewImagesDark.description: preview image file names. These will be taken from the solution artifacts. used for dark theme support

providers.description: Providers for the solution content item

source.description: Source of the content.  This is where/how it was created.

support.description: Support information for the metadata - type, name, contact information

threatAnalysisTechniques.description: the techniques the resource covers, these have to be aligned with the tactics being used

version.description: Version of the content.  Default and recommended format is numeric (e.g. 1, 1.0, 1.0.0, 1.0.0.0), following ARM template best practices.  Can also be any string, but then we cannot guarantee any version checks

name.description: Name of the content source.  The repo name, solution name, LA workspace name etc.

sourceId.description: ID of the content source.  The solution ID, workspace ID, etc

link.description: Link for support help, like to support page to open a ticket etc.

name.description: Name of the support contact. Company or person.

tier.description: Type of support for content item

contentSchemaVersion.description: Schema version of the content. Can be used to distinguish between different flow based on the schema version

customVersion.description: The custom version of the content. A optional free text

dependencies.description: Dependencies for the content item, what other content items it requires to work.  Can describe more complex dependencies using a recursive/nested structure. For a single dependency an id/kind/version can be supplied or operator/criteria for complex formats.

displayName.description: The display name of the template

icon.description: the icon identifier. this id can later be fetched from the content metadata

lastPublishDate.description: last publish date for the content item

mainTemplate.description: The JSON of the ARM template to deploy active content

packageId.description: the package Id contains this template

packageKind.description: the packageKind of the package contains this template

packageName.description: the name of the package contains this template

packageVersion.description: Version of the package.  Default and recommended format is numeric (e.g. 1, 1.0, 1.0.0, 1.0.0.0), following ARM metadata best practices.  Can also be any string, but then we cannot guarantee any version checks

previewImages.description: preview image file names. These will be taken from the solution artifacts

previewImagesDark.description: preview image file names. These will be taken from the solution artifacts. used for dark theme support

source.description: Source of the content.  This is where/how it was created.

support.description: Support information for the template - type, name, contact information

threatAnalysisTechniques.description: the techniques the resource covers, these have to be aligned with the tactics being used

version.description: Version of the content.  Default and recommended format is numeric (e.g. 1, 1.0, 1.0.0, 1.0.0.0), following ARM metadata best practices.  Can also be any string, but then we cannot guarantee any version checks

kind.description: The kind of the alert rule

alertRuleTemplateName.description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

enabled.description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

kind.description: The kind of the alert rule

createdByRef.description: Created by reference of threat intelligence entity

description.description: Description of a threat intelligence entity

displayName.description: Display name of a threat intelligence entity

externalId.description: External ID of threat intelligence entity

externalLastUpdatedTimeUtc.description: External last updated time in UTC

indicatorTypes.description: Indicator types of threat intelligence entities

objectMarkingRefs.description: Threat intelligence entity object marking references

pattern.description: Pattern of a threat intelligence entity

patternType.description: Pattern type of a threat intelligence entity

patternVersion.description: Pattern version of a threat intelligence entity

source.description: Source of a threat intelligence entity

state.description: Describe whether this data type connection is enabled or not.

dataTypes.description: The available data types for the connector.

tenantId.description: The tenant id to connect to, and get the data from.

tipLookbackPeriod.description: The lookback period for the feed to be imported.

properties.description: Threat intelligence TAXII data connector properties.

state.description: Describe whether this data type connection is enabled or not.

collectionId.description: The collection id of the TAXII server.

dataTypes.description: The available data types for Threat Intelligence TAXII data connector.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for the TAXII server.

password.description: The password for the TAXII server.

pollingFrequency.description: The polling frequency for the TAXII server.

taxiiLookbackPeriod.description: The lookback period for the TAXII server.

taxiiServer.description: The API root for the TAXII server.

tenantId.description: The tenant id to connect to, and get the data from.

userName.description: The userName for the TAXII server.

dataSources.description: The relevant data sources that enriched by ueba

objectId.description: The object id of the user.

created.description: The time the watchlist item was created

createdBy.description: Describes a user that created the watchlist item

entityMapping.description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item entity mapping

isDeleted.description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist item is deleted or not

itemsKeyValue.description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item

tenantId.description: The tenantId to which the watchlist item belongs to

updated.description: The last time the watchlist item was updated

updatedBy.description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist item

watchlistItemId.description: The id (a Guid) of the watchlist item

watchlistItemType.description: The type of the watchlist item

contentType.description: The content type of the raw content. Example : text/csv or text/tsv

created.description: The time the watchlist was created

createdBy.description: Describes a user that created the watchlist

defaultDuration.description: The default duration of a watchlist (in ISO 8601 duration format)

displayName.description: The display name of the watchlist

isDeleted.description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist is deleted or not

itemsSearchKey.description: The search key is used to optimize query performance when using watchlists for joins with other data. For example, enable a column with IP addresses to be the designated SearchKey field, then use this field as the key field when joining to other event data by IP address.

labels.description: List of labels relevant to this watchlist

numberOfLinesToSkip.description: The number of lines in a csv/tsv content to skip before the header

rawContent.description: The raw content that represents to watchlist items to create. In case of csv/tsv content type, it's the content of the file that will parsed by the endpoint

source.description: The filename of the watchlist, called 'source'

tenantId.description: The tenantId where the watchlist belongs to

updated.description: The last time the watchlist was updated

updatedBy.description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist

uploadStatus.description: The status of the Watchlist upload : New, InProgress or Complete. Pls note : When a Watchlist upload status is equal to InProgress, the Watchlist cannot be deleted

watchlistId.description: The id (a Guid) of the watchlist

rotateWebhookSecret.description: A flag to instruct the backend service to rotate webhook secret.

items.description: List of resources included in this workspace manager assignment

targetResourceName.description: The resource name of the workspace manager group targeted by the workspace manager assignment

mode.description: The current mode of the workspace manager configuration

description.description: The description of the workspace manager group

displayName.description: The display name of the workspace manager group

memberResourceNames.description: The names of the workspace manager members participating in this group.

targetWorkspaceResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource ID of the target Sentinel workspace joining the given Sentinel workspace manager

targetWorkspaceTenantId.description: Tenant id of the target Sentinel workspace joining the given Sentinel workspace manager
